comments.html: i think that the amount of reordering caused by packet spraying in data centers is widely overestimated. see also: https://engineering.purdue.edu/~ychu/publications/infocom13_pktspray.pdf if one finds that the paths are too asymmetrical in delay, flowlets or something more advanced such as hula might be thinkable. at that scale though, it might be worth looking into optical circuit switching.
